title: third year in a row, C9 the last hope of NA
body:
C9 TAKE MY ENERGY ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ

Edit: omg! so many upvotes! so much energy! 
http://i.imgur.com/AUhUuZh.gif
Edit 2: A big thank you to pinkyblossom for the edited gif!

Edit 3: 4 hours still group B starts guys! Thank you for all the energy you've given, now its up to C9 to use it to win. Godspeed C9!

Edit 4: I am.. going to cry

replies.body: ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つi lend you my energy C9 may you claim victory over Majin Skt
Im sad clg choked today i cry
FreeLG? Or CLFree? YOU DECIDE
Freelogic Gaming or Counter Logic Free. What

> [{quoted}](name=LordBahamutXVI,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=hAJwsPMX,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-09T00:28:07.805+0000)
>
> Freelogic Gaming or Counter Logic Free. What

Choker Logic Gaming?
Can't Leave Groups more like

> [{quoted}](name=The Giratina,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=hAJwsPMX,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-08T23:03:33.063+0000)
>
> FreeLG? Or CLFree? YOU DECIDE

I think CLG is accurate.
C.L.G. = Can't Leave Groups

Here, have this:

http://i.imgur.com/AUhUuZh.gifv

Thank you so much!! I was trying to do something similar by putting the C9 logo on goku and the fnatic, skt, origen, and koo logos on the planet of this gif http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/326/c/4/spirit_bomb_2_by_gokansupersaiyan-d6v52bq.gif , but I couldn't figure out how :P

But yea thank you so much!
sorry dude, Origen will save western pride winning worlds
My dream is an Origen vs. C9 Finals. I wouldn't even care who'd win, just seeing that matchup as the finals would be so beautiful.
Tbh i agree with u. that match up would be legendary if it happens

Twitch chat

http://www.gifmania.com/Gif-Animados-Paisajes/Imagenes-Elementos-Naturales/Fuego/Explosiones-Nucleares/Bomba-Atomica-69082.gif
I'd want Origen to win

Truth. Honestly i consider xPeke's success with Origen the real "Miracle Run". Going straight from Challenger to LCS to Worlds in the same year is much better then a team whose just done overall crappy but happened to pull some wins out of their ass last minute.

P.S. That doesn't mean i don't love cloud 9 i just respect Origen as a team more at the moment.
They'll have to go against Fnatic first! (Yes, I still have faith!)
They already did.
And they lost, remember?
I sort of remember Balls pentadunking them and winning the game.
I'm talking about Fnatic vs Origen...
Boy, have I got a game to show you.
If my memory is good, Fnatic went 21-0 until Origen in finals then won 3-2.

Ehhh, Fnatic kind of flopped so far. They were almost entirely undefeated (unless they went totally undefeated and I'm remembering wrong) during summer split but aren't really holding up consistently against teams they should be beating.
They just happened to have 2 bad games in a row. Huni tilted against AHQ and they didn't respect C9's draft. Those are one-time mistakes.
You can make half a dozen one time mistakes really easily.
Said every teenage mom ever

I thought TSM still had a chance? Well only if they go undefeated next time they play and KT drops a few games. I mean it's a longshot but TSM has been known to pull off miracle BS before.

Regardless: ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ

TSM are my fav from NA. But I don't think they will get pass Origen, which are very flexible regarding tactics and picks.

Only hope I have for TSM, and fear for Origen; Origen can still get cocky and fail badly coz of that.
༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ I too will join the cause.
1st Canadian team CLG has fallen, second canadian team C9 still stand ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ #believe
GLG fans are more proud of justin beiber atm than they are of CLG
LMAO yes. Was talking to my friend before Chem lab, he's a clg fan and I wish you could have seen the look on his face when I broke it to him that clg lost to koo and fw
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CNsgytSUwAAMtLi.png

༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つC9 TAKE MY ENERGY ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ

Everyone who has the C9 Icon needs to spam the emote ingame to give them more energy!

I dont know what to do

I play in NA
I live in LAN
And I want Fnatic to win

But what the hell


C9 TAKE MY ENERGY ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ

Please, I want to laugh at my roommate so bad for mocking my support of C9 this season. Give your fans vengeance upon our hater foes!

Keep up the gauntlet run all the way to the world cup, boys!
